name: Beware the Faerie Food You Eat
name_original: Beware the Faerie Food You Eat
description:
—A Twine Game made for the 2015 Wag Challenge—

They say that some of the faerie folk can grant wishes, that they can give gifts to that who gain their favor.

Now, you've found a portal into their world and you're ready to step through and claim that prize.

But you don't come unprepared. You come with supplies, and knowledge, and a persistent warning:

Beware the Faerie Food You Eat

Itch.io's display options for Twine don't play nice with the game and prevent scrolling, so the file is available for download below to play offline or you can play online on the version hosted on my website.
